featured.title: Cambridge exams
featured.description: Cambridge exams are recognised as qualifications that certify knowledge of the English language.

subLinks.label: Cursuri KET
subLinks.description: A2 Key is one of the Cambridge English qualifications. This basic level qualification is designed to start your learning of English.

subLinks.label: Cursuri PET
subLinks.description: B1 Preliminary is one of the Cambridge English qualifications. With this exam, you demonstrate that you have mastered the fundamentals of English.

subLinks.label: Cursuri FCE
subLinks.description: B2 First is one of the most popular Cambridge English qualifications and is recognised worldwide by thousands of employers and educational institutions.

subLinks.label: Cursuri CAE
subLinks.description: C1 Advanced is one of the Cambridge English qualifications. It is our top-level qualification, which shows that you have the language skills that employers and universities are looking for.

featured.title: Cursuri pentru adulti
featured.description: Cambridge exams are recognised as qualifications that certify knowledge of the English language.

subLinks.label: Cursuri de engleza conversationala
subLinks.description: A2 Key is one of the Cambridge English qualifications. This basic level qualification is designed to start your learning of English.

subLinks.label: Cursuri individuale de engleza
subLinks.description: B1 Preliminary is one of the Cambridge English qualifications. With this exam, you demonstrate that you have mastered the fundamentals of English.
